amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-786 to create an industry-based pilot trawl survey for the New England and Mid-Atlantic Fishery Management Council regions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
